Description.Text: We're delighted to say that BEST WESTERN Willerby Manor Hotel is one of the highest rated AA hotels in the Hull area. No wonder! With 3 acres of beautiful gardens, it provides an unrivalled setting for your overnight stay or special occasion...with an enviable reputation for the quality of the food too! The hotel boasts a brand new contemporary brassiere, complete with a wonderful (and spacious) outside dining area, so you can chill out with a hot meal in relaxing settings! Only four miles from the busy, bustling city of Hull, you'll be in the right place to explore the historic sites of Beverley and York nearby. All bedrooms are individually decorated to an exceptionally high standard, all with ensuite facilities. And for fitness fanatics, use of the extensive health club facilities, including 18 metre swimming pool, sauna, steam room, is absolutely free. Coast, countryside and convenience await, so what are you waiting for?
